places_with_reviews.name: Lambhvel Hanumanji Temple
places_with_reviews.address: Nadiad-Anand Rd, Purushottam Nagar, Lambhvel, Gujarat 388315, India

reviews.text:
Shree Lambhvel Hanumanjji

Lambhvel village is located just 2 Km of Anand city Gujarat. This village is famous for Swayambhu Lord Hanumanji Temple. It is a centre of faith since long time in and around Anand. This temple is located on Anand - Kanjari Road in huge campus with lot of facilities for devotee and tourist. The idol of lord Hanumanji is Swayambhu attracts thousands of devotee throughout the year and especially on Saturday and Tuesday. on Kali Chaudas, day before Diwali, a huge fair is held at Hanumanji temple of Lambhwel where thousands of devotee from nearby area visit with great faith and devotion.

Swayambhu Hanumanji Mandir located at small village Lambhavel just 2 km away from Anand, Gujarat is centre of faith since long time in surrounding area of Anand. This temple is located on Anand – Kanjari Road in huge campus with lot of facilities for devotee and tourist. The idol of Lord Hanumanji is Swayambhu – Spontaneous with divine power which attracts thousands of devotee throughout the year and especially on Saturday and Tuesday. Temple trust manages the huge campus along with the ceremony hall where function can be arranged. Apart from this temple manages various social, cultural, religious, medical related activities for general public of nearby area. On Kali Chaudas, day before Diwali, a huge fair is held at Hanumanji temple of Lambhwel where thousands of devotee from nearby area visit with great faith and devotion. Lot of devotee reach here on feet as per the wish and faith.
Very good environment inside the temple also there is nicely architectural building which enhance the look of temple and attracts more visitors and when it was decorated it looks so beautiful

Jai Jai shree ram 🚩 I must recommend to visit lambhavel Hanuman ji temple.never ever any reason for compair hanumanji with other things we are not able to give any appreciation for that environment it's truly spritual,and RAMMAY .I love hanuman ji lambhavel whole aarti. Ram Lakshman janki Jai bolo Hanuman ki 🚩🙏🙏🙏

Jay shree hanuman Dada
Best hanuman temple in lambhvel
It is very old temple but so real
We visit here every week and take blessings
So many people visit here every day but specially on Tuesday and Saturday
Vibe is so pure
Packing is available
A place of spiritual significance, the temple of Lord Hanumanji Dada, has been standing for five centuries, radiating holiness.

places_with_reviews.name: ISKCON Vidyanagar(Sri Sri Radha Giridhariji)
places_with_reviews.address: GWXF+844, Iskcon Rd, opp. B&B Polytechnic College, Mota Bazaar, Vallabh Vidyanagar, Anand, Gujarat 388120, India

reviews.text: The most beautiful and alive idols of Radha-Giridhari I have ever seen. I was not able to shift my eyes anywhere once I see lord Radha Krishna. 🙏
Sweetest deities & lovely little temple. So wonderful to hear they will be constructing a larger temple to accommodate the huge numbers during the festivals! Sri Sri Radha Giridhari ki jai 🙌

To experience spiritually of Iskcon in Vidyanagar, you must visit here. Witness Mesmerizing idols of Sri Radha Giridhari ji. This photos taken on the day of Hindu new year. On this day you can take prasadam of Maha Annakoot. Parking is available on main road.

Religious place. Nice and holy ambience. Very good decorations.Parking is not available. Very tasty kichdi is served as prasad on Sunday. Apart from temple one good restaurant is there beside temple which is managed by Temple staff. Food available is very nice and cost effective also.
Very small but beautiful temple..Always welcome if you want to feel the love and peace...

places_with_reviews.name: Atmiya Vidhya Dham (AVD)
places_with_reviews.address: Bakrol Rd, behind GCET College, Tirath Society, Mota Bazaar, Vallabh Vidyanagar, Anand, Gujarat 388120, India

reviews.text: I visited this Atmiya Vidhya Dham (AVD), Bakrol, Anand. An excellent example of science and spirituality, where you will get pure peace and feel your self so calm. One of the finest campus where lush green area, Lord Swaminarayan Mandir, Sant Niwas, Big dining area, College with Hostel for boys and huge parking space. Whenever you visit this campus and prayer in the temple you just felt some kind of inner peace and calmness. Must visit and Jay Swaminarayan.

Atmiya Vidhya Dham Bakrol Temple offers a serene and spiritually uplifting experience for visitors seeking a place of worship and reflection. Nestled in a tranquil setting, this temple provides a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of daily life.

The temple's architecture is a blend of traditional and modern elements, creating a unique ambiance that resonates with both devotees and architecture enthusiasts. The intricate carvings and attention to detail in the construction showcase the dedication of the artisans who brought the temple to life.

Visitors are greeted with a sense of tranquility as they enter the temple premises. The well-maintained gardens and pathways provide a soothing environment for introspection and meditation. The temple's design encourages a sense of reverence, making it an ideal place for devotees to connect with their spirituality.

Devotees often praise the serene atmosphere within the temple complex. The peaceful ambiance allows individuals to engage in prayers and rituals with a focused mind. Regular religious ceremonies and events are conducted, further enriching the spiritual experience for those who participate.

The temple's community involvement is commendable, as it often organizes charitable activities, educational programs, and cultural events that contribute positively to the local community. This dedication to service aligns well with the temple's mission of fostering spiritual growth and holistic development.

While Atmiya Vidhya Dham Bakrol Temple offers a tranquil and spiritually enriching environment, some visitors might find the facilities and amenities to be more basic compared to larger or more established temples. Additionally, the temple's popularity can lead to relatively crowded conditions during peak visiting hours.

In conclusion, Atmiya Vidhya Dham Bakrol Temple is a place where spirituality and tranquility converge. Its unique architecture, serene ambiance, and community-focused initiatives make it a destination worth visiting for individuals seeking a respite from the demands of modern life and a chance to reconnect with their inner selves.

The perfect blend of education and spiritually, as soon as you enter here you can feel great vibes. This place was especially made for students of Vidhya Nagar, who came here for their studies they can stay here.

The main Attraction is beautiful white marble temple in center and huge open lawn in front of it.

Parking is also available here for visitors.

Best time to visit here is in the evening. You can feel nature all around you.

It's a Divine College and Hostel for the youngsters, you will find the Peace here and you will experience the holy divine peace soul for your mind, The sculpture of the temple is awesome and unique, here the Playground for the students and all type of sports zones are here, they nurture the children for the mind and body fitness both, and the best thing is that they also nurture the kid like a mother

✅Very well maintained premises. Spiritual environment, opportunity to uplift the soul, friendly staff, better guidance than any where else.

🚫Don’t recommend for those who have an allergy of good and spiritual friends.
My photo shoot 📸
Nice Hindu temple

Best peace full place and beautiful...what a engraving in the place...best art and design and world famous temple...
Meldi maa most popular temple..🚩
Jay maa meldi...🚩🙏🏻😍
Very good
Feel blessed when I visited at the temple and the greatest thing is that they are building new temple and it's so big and lovely

places_with_reviews.name: Bh V K Auto parts
places_with_reviews.address: Mota Bazaar, Vallabh Vidyanagar, Anand, Gujarat 388120, India

reviews.text: Bhaikaka circle is place in VVN where we can have options to do shopping or eat outside or going towards railway station or bus station by Auto or city bus. Gujarat transport ST buses and travels used to Stop here for pickup and drop. It is not far from Town hall or Anand New busstand.

It’s a roundabout. And a very busy one at that.

Traffic is hectic here unless there are traffic police in the area. Cars, buses, bikes, trucks cows all mingling  together to get past each other and hardly anyone wants to stop.
Value for time
Traffic is the one problem...otherwise it is good.
One the busiest road or circle in city. You will see traffic in morning in-between 7 to 9 and after 6 to 8 pm.

places_with_reviews.name: BAPS Shri Swaminarayan Mandir
places_with_reviews.address: Goya Talav, HX33+8VJ, Mathiya Chora, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text:
Must visit temple if you are visiting Anand.
Amazing, Spiritual & peaceful atmosphere. You can enjoy delicious, quality & quantity food at Premvati.
Also surrounded by other temples like Amba mata, Jalaram, Hanuman ji, Shivji, Gayatri mata etc.

About Temple :-
An iconic landmark of Anand, the temple is a place of fervent devotion and piety. The Swami Narayan Mandir is the famed six storeyed building which draws huge crowds to its doors.

The temple is built with an architectural magnificence like no other and is soothing to the eyes. The temple is very popular in the region for its beauty, for its deity and its religious significance. Some of the deities presiding over the temple and being worshipped here include Narayan Lakshmi, Harikrishna Maharaj, Guru Parampara and Ghanshyam Maharaj.

Must visit temple if you are visiting Anand, nice & peaceful atmosphere. Premvati is also located nearby. Also surrounded by other temples like Amba mata, Jalaram, Hanuman ji, Shivji, Gayatri devi etc.

Parking is available too.

A place where you can get relief like all other Swaminarayan temples throughout Gujarat .
Nice temple but a little bit smaller as compared to other Swaminarayan temples I have seen.
Religious and calm place to stay .

DIVINE PLACE APC VVNAGAR. MUST PLACE TO VISIT N FEEL PEACE. N DIVINITY . NICE HOSTEL FOR BOYS ONLY. GOOD MANAGEMENT BY BAPS SAINTS EXPERTS VOLUNTEERS N ELDERS. EXCELLENT HEALTHY VEG.FOOD FOR STUDENTS N NICE MANDIR FOR PRAYERS N SPIRITUAL UPLIFTMENT. GR8 PLACE. I LOVE APC MY HOME.

JAY SWAMINARAYAN
This is very holy place. Must visit. Very famous in the anand. Location is very nice. Near Goya તળાવ. Center point.

places_with_reviews.name: Anoopam Mission
places_with_reviews.address: Brahmajyoti, Yogiji Marg, Mogri, Anand, Gujarat 388345, India

reviews.text: The temple was well-maintained and spacious enough to host weddings and spiritual events

Sant Bhagvant Sahebji Maharaj has created “Akshardham” on Earth! Relaxing and soothing environment as soon as we enter arena.
Song of sculptures in Pink Stone and white marble..
Idols of Bhagvan Swaminarayan - Santo and respected Mukto in temple - brings us close to glory of past. Inspired for future!
Nutan Mandir and Nij Mandir are place where we feel VIBES OF VISCINITY TO GOD..
Peacocks - Parrots - Monkeys too find this place as “own home”! None bothered with or bothering our presence!
Daily Arti and Bhajans playing in campus is an experience beyond explanation…
Worth a visit to understand what Anoopam Path is created by SAFFRON HEARTED - KARMAYOGI SADHUs of SWAMINARAYAN SAMPRADAY

My family and I visited this beautiful Hindu temple.  The architecture is stunning, and the peace one feels is rejuvenating.

Do visit the museum, and take time out to read the insightful messages curved on the pillars of the temple.
Great socio spiritual place. Disciplined, organized and dedicated volunteers.

The atmosphere is very soothing and relaxing. Here you can feel the peace of nature,Chirping of birds especially peacocks. And the entire campus seems alive with divine music.You can feel one step closer to the almighty God here.The campus has its own school along with an IT centre to enrich the students behaviour, managed by Anoopam Mission. And the heart of the campus is temple of lord Swaminarayan.

places_with_reviews.name: Sardar Patel Memorial, Karamsad
places_with_reviews.address: 17, Anand - Sojitra Rd, Phase -IV, Karamsad, Anand, Gujarat 388121, India

reviews.text: Must visit this memorial of great leader Sardar Shri Vallabhbhai Patel. Rare photographs of  Sardar are in gallery.  Beautifully landscaped garden.
Beautiful memorial at the birthplace of Sardar Patel ji. Nicely maintained

There is not much to view inside the  museum becoz it's still under construction, a documentary of the struggle was projected for half an hour later you can just walk around the place, the garden is simple yet beautiful. It's better to go after few months for spending a proper vacation. Have a good visit.
I was gone in Garden in 2011 then after visited in 2024 i was surprised with the AC Hall. Because I didn't know that there is a Hall too in the Center of the Garden .

At Sardar Patel Memorial we have done branding work for many big shows
And it was a lot of fun in that work and there was a lot of success and good experience in branding the event of Khadi Gram Udyog
Khadhi Gram Udyog and Sardar Patel Memorial Team were very satisfied with our work.
And we hope to have their cooperation in future also

places_with_reviews.name: Shree Rokadiya Hanumanji Temple
places_with_reviews.address: Talav, Gopalanand Swami Marg, near Goya, behind P.M Patel College, Rahtlav, Mathiya Chora, Anand, Gujarat 388001, India

reviews.text: It is a nice temple to visit, and parking is available on the street.

Blessed  by visit this temple.🙏 Temple authority is following proper COVID guideline. Seprate queue for Men and Women. The murti of Lord Hanuman is almost of Treta Yug was established by Nardji & Hanumanji himself as per the order of Shri Ram. Operated By Shir Swaminarayan Temple Vadtal Gaadi. Jay Swaminarayan and Jay Rokadiya Hanumanji Maharaj.

Today when the whole nation is chanting ram dhun i visited the rokadiya dev temple and they are playing swaminarayan dhun. I mean no offence but the temple committee should be mature enough to understand this. Even beside hanumanji there are banners of swaminarayan. I mean come on that is the place you found?
No offence to any god but hanuman temple feels more like a swaminarayan temple. Even they have a dedicated flag post to show the swaminarayan flag in the entrance. On the temple also multiple swaminarayan flags are flown. I was a visitor of the temple from my childhood for this temple but now such things really feel bad.

With utmost prominence among pilgrims and devotes, the popularity of Anand as a religious place remains intact. Among several other temples and shrines, there is one small but extremely prominent place of worship that is regarded as a place of profound spiritual sanctity that is Shri Rokadia Hanuman Mandir in Anand.

Rakodia Hanuman Temple is dedicated to lord Hanuman the Monkey God. The temple is located at the top of Hanuman of Tekro also called the Hanuman Hill. The temple was constructed by king Mayurdhwaj of Kheda. It is the one of the very few temples belonging to Swaminarayan Sampraday in which the central deity is not Hanuman. And this is the only temple in which the central deity is Lord Hanuman. In other temples where human gods are not the central deity, Hanuman idols are placed along with Lord Ganpati (the Elephant God).

Temple: Shree Hanumanji Dada
Location: On the edge of Gopi Talav, Anand

Story:
Shri Bhagwan Swaminarayan along with his followers and saints visited here and gave upadesh to treat others with pity (daya),however they treat you badly.
Gopalanand swami had given shawl to Bhairav here.
N that Bhairav dada turns into his original Hanumanji  Swaroop.

Presently:
New construction is going on.
You can see beautiful artwork of stone with special bandhani of Shikhar gumbaj n flooring.
Mandir also have a small yagnashala with magnificent wood art work.

Swaminarayan bhagwan life incidences are engraved on temple surrounding wallls with colors.

Must visit for Swaminarayan devotees.
